mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, title =#{title}, `body`= #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, IFNULL(SUM(RP.point), 0) AS extra__sumReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(RP.point > 0, RP.point, 0)), 0) AS extra__goodReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(RP.point < 0, RP.point, 0)), 0) AS extra__badReactionPoint FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN reactionPoint AS RP ON A.id = RP.relId AND RP.relTypeCode = 'article'
WHERE A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
GROUP BY A.id ORDER BY A.id DESC LIMIT #{articleFrom}, #{articlesPerPage}
SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM article AS A
WHERE A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
WHERE A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
WHERE A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM article AS A WHERE A.boardId = #{boardId}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
